name: autoaziz-workspace
description: Auto Aziz - Système de gestion de rendez-vous avec vérification

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Auto Aziz Team
